    API

    APIs are a mite lower thank Apps on the Pecking order, they can be seen as Apps strictly for integration. APIs oﬀer http-based interfaces for sending bulk SMS and initiating USSD push information to subscribers who are subscribed to your instance or who don’t have a DND proﬁle.
